Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 104-104.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 137.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Production and Regulation

official_title: A bill to extend the deadline under the Federal Power Act applicable to the construction of a hydroelectric project in Ohio, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon the request of a specified licensee, to extend for a maximum of three consecutive two-year periods the time required for commencement of construction of a certain hydroelectric project in the State of Ohio.

titles.title: A bill to extend the deadline under the Federal Power Act applicable to the construction of a hydroelectric project in Ohio, and for other purposes.
